pullrequest.title: Remove gazebo include subdir from pkgconfig and cmake config

content.raw:
Should we take care of some of them missing in drcsim?

```
./ros/atlas_msgs/test_ros_plugin.hh:23:#include "physics/physics.hh"
./ros/atlas_msgs/test_ros_plugin.hh:24:#include "transport/TransportTypes.hh"
./ros/atlas_msgs/test_ros_plugin.hh:25:#include "common/Time.hh"
./ros/atlas_msgs/test_ros_plugin.hh:26:#include "common/Plugin.hh"
./ros/atlas_msgs/test_ros_plugin.hh:27:#include "common/Events.hh"
./ros/atlas_msgs/test_ros_plugin.hh:29:#include "boost/thread/mutex.hpp"
```
